title: Ajiya
description: Yi ajiya da Supra coin a Meridian Node don samun 8% APY tare da ladan Pecky na kullum, ko kuma ka yi ajiya da Pecky a Node don samun kudin shiga na dindindin. Duk ladar ajiya daza,a Samu kyauta ne ba tare da an caje ku ku…óin caji ba.
